message: This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a high-quality product that will bring immense value to your portfolio. At $1000000, it's a steal considering its true worth. Don't miss out on this chance!

Thanks for the recommendation, Alice. However, I need to be cautious with such a large investment.  Could you provide some evidence or a guarantee about the quality of the product? I'd feel more comfortable making a decision with more information.
